CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| OTS |

Note:

* PCDTBT stands for poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT) doped with 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene-2,5-dicarboxylic acid (EDOT-COOH)
* PCDSeBT stands for poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT) doped with 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene-2,5-bis(triethylsiloxy) derivative (EDOT-Si)
* OTS stands for octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |

Note:

* PCDTBT stands for poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT) doped with 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene-2,5-dicarboxylic acid (EDOT-COOH)
* PCDSeBT stands for poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT) doped with 3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene-2,5-bis(triethylsiloxy) derivative (EDOT-Si)

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| OTS |
| Si |
| SiO2 |

Note:

* PCDTBT and PCDSeBT are the names of specific polymers.
* OTS is the name of a specific chemical compound (octadecyltrichlorosilane).
* Si and SiO2 are the chemical symbols for silicon and silicon dioxide, respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| OTS |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties:

* Si (silicon) and SiO2 (silicon dioxide) are not specific properties of the materials mentioned in the paragraph, but rather the chemical symbols for the elements silicon and silicon dioxide, respectively.
* "top" and "bottom" are not material properties, but rather spatial relationships.
* "contact" and "field-effect" are not material properties, but rather aspects of the device structure.
* "solution processed" is not a material property, but rather a method of fabrication.
* "self-assembled monolayer" (SAM) is not a material property, but rather a method of surface modification.
